comments:
I cannot copy and paste logic shapes on a logic diagram.  An exception occurs (see below for stack trace).  The paste operation tries to find a Node that was copied (for which it has the containment feature reference), but the Node was not saved to the clipboard.

Note that this problem predates the EMF Transaction API adoption in GMF (Bug 121508).

Copy and paste of Geoshapes on the logic diagram works fine.

Steps:
1. Create a new example logic diagram
2. Drop an OR gate onto the diagram
3. Select the gate, right click and select Copy
4. Select the Diagram surface, right click and select Paste

Partial stack trace:

java.lang.AssertionError: proxy is the same as eObj
at org.eclipse.gmf.runtime.emf.clipboard.core.internal.PasteIntoParentOperation.getContentObject2ProxyMap(PasteIntoParentOperation.java:750)
at org.eclipse.gmf.runtime.emf.clipboard.core.internal.PasteIntoParentOperation.<init>(PasteIntoParentOperation.java:165)
at org.eclipse.gmf.runtime.emf.clipboard.core.internal.PasteOperation.getParentPasteProcess(PasteOperation.java:85)
at org.eclipse.gmf.runtime.emf.clipboard.core.internal.PasteOperation.paste(PasteOperation.java:98)
at org.eclipse.gmf.runtime.emf.clipboard.core.ClipboardUtil.pasteElementsFromStringDelagate(ClipboardUtil.java:233)
at org.eclipse.gmf.runtime.emf.clipboard.core.ClipboardUtil.pasteElementsFromString(ClipboardUtil.java:177)
at org.eclipse.gmf.runtime.emf.core.util.EObjectUtil$3.run(EObjectUtil.java:919)
at org.eclipse.gmf.runtime.emf.core.internal.notifications.MSLEventBroker.runWithNoSemProcs(MSLEventBroker.java:159)
at org.eclipse.gmf.runtime.emf.core.internal.domain.MSLEditingDomain.runWithNoSemProcs(MSLEditingDomain.java:1115)
at org.eclipse.gmf.runtime.emf.core.util.OperationUtil.runWithNoSemProcs(OperationUtil.java:394)
at org.eclipse.gmf.runtime.emf.core.util.EObjectUtil.deserialize(EObjectUtil.java:916)
at org.eclipse.gmf.runtime.diagram.ui.internal.commands.PasteCommand.pasteFromString(PasteCommand.java:107)
at org.eclipse.gmf.runtime.diagram.ui.internal.commands.PasteCommand.doExecute(PasteCommand.java:91)
Must have been fixed indirectly.  I have latest bits from mid-day Feb 10th and it works fine.

traces.message: proxy is the same as eObj
